resources.string: Let others also know about place which are unsafe by marking your location as Red Zone.
Let the cops know about your vulnerability by sending a alert message just by shaking your phone.
You can share information regarding a particular location where you already have been.

We can not only share our incident or accident but also we can also share something good about a place. Lets make this world happy and a safe place to live in. Spread happiness and awareness as well.\n\n#SaveLifes #AwesomeApp #BeAHelpingHand
